original_title: Catherine ou les atomes d'une âme paumée
overview: Catherine, a young woman of 17 years extremely shy and reserved met one day Melanie. They very quickly become friends, eventually, Catherine falls under the spell of Thierry, a young man with whom she will live a passion for several months before that it does not lose sight of. Did fear?
title: Catherine ou les atomes d'une âme paumée
